document.full_text: twenty-eight people were killed in a shootout among suspected rival drug gangs on a remote highway in the mexican pacific coast state of nayarit, authorities said.
document.title: drug gang gunfight kills 28 in mexican state
lines_and_colors: twenty-eight people were killed in a shootout among suspected rival drug gangs on a remote highway in the mexican pacific coast state of nayarit, authorities said.
